Name: Invite Friend
ActivityDes: You can share your invite code to Lv.≥20 commandants. If they use your code, you will have invited them successfully.

Name: Invite Code
ActivityDes: Welcome back to Gray Raven HQ. You can input the invite code of other commandants to receive corresponding rewards.

Name: Returning Player Experience Survey
ActivityDes:
Requirements: Commandant Lv.40

Event Info:
In order to create a better gaming environment, the Command Central has decided to conduct a survey regarding the in-game experiences of returning players. Please tap the [Advance] button below to share your thoughts! Rewards will be granted upon completion of the survey.

Name: Return Support
ActivityDes: During the event, commandants in the "Return" state can complete the missions and get the rewards (the event ends when the Return state expires).

Name: Lightbearer's Voyage
ActivityDes: Event Info: 1. Complete event missions to obtain [Honor Medals].

Name: Blazing Simulacrum
ActivityDes: Event Info: Play through the new story [Blazing Simulacrum] and complete missions.

Name: Games of Chess
ActivityDes:
Requirements: Commandant Lv.40.

Stage open until: 2024/10/30, 06:59 (UTC)
Event shop open until: 2024/10/31, 01:59 (UTC)

Event Info:
1. You can obtain event tokens by clearing a stage.
2. Event tokens can be used to purchase items from the event shop.
3. Clearing a stage will earn you Challenge EXP. Your Authority Level will be increased when you earn a certain amount of Challenge EXP. Increased Authority Level will grant Battle bonuses including DMG increase.
(Note: Those bonuses can be applied to Games of Chess stages only.)

Name: Chessboard Realms
ActivityDes:
Requirements: Commandant Lv.40
Event Info:
1. Control BLACK★ROCK SHOOTER to crack chess puzzles and defeat the White King to win!
2. BLACK★ROCK SHOOTER has Rock Cannon and Black Blade. The Rock Cannon is for AOE DMG, and the Black Blade is for more flexible single target damage.
3. The Rock Cannon has special skills to stun enemy pieces, while the Black Blade has the passive ability to grant an extra round.
4. Complete the stages to get Node Data and Additional Data. Exchange Node Data and Additional Data for Inver-Shard - BLACK★ROCK SHOOTER, Stamps, Event Construct R&D Tickets, and other items.

Name: Forever Racer
ActivityDes:
Requirements: Commandant Lv.40.

Event Info:
1. Forever Racer contains multiple chapters that will be available over time.
2. Each chapter has multiple node stages and one ending stage. The ending stage will be unlocked after node stages are cleared.
3. Each stage's environment is unique. Commandant should select one of the given traits accordingly.
4. The ending stage will inherit all traits of the challenged stages. Stage traits can be blocked. Traits blocked over one hour will reduce the chapter's rating.
5. Complete Forever Racer chapter missions to obtain Event Construct R&D Tickets, Trade Vouchers, and other items.

Name: Brandishing Tunes
ActivityDes:
Requirements: Commandant Lv.40.

Event Info:

1. There will be 7 songs available, which will be unlocked over time and require Commandant to complete the corresponding dances with companions.
2. The NPC on stage will dance along with the music, and the characters off stage should do the same.
3. The first character should do the NPC's first dance move, the second should do the second, and so on.
4. The dance moves should be done on the beat. The more accurate you're, the higher the score.
5. Complete missions during the event to claim event rewards!

Name: Glimpse of the End
ActivityDes:
Requirements: Commandant Lv.40
Event Info:
1. There are a total of 5 difficulty levels, all of which are highly challenging with [DEAD MASTER] being your formidable enemy.
2. All members will be reset once knocked out during the challenge, making the challenge easier to complete.
3. Each stage has its own 3-star clearance conditions. Collectibles will be rewarded once you have earned a total of 3 stars. The more stars you earn, the higher the quality of the collectibles will be.

Name: Target - BLACK★ROCK SHOOTER
ActivityDes:
New Collab Character:
※A-Rank Construct [BLACK★ROCK SHOOTER] (Fire Attacker)
New Weapon:
※6★ [★Rock Cannon] (Bladed Cannon)

Info:
1. Character Research:
※[BLACK★ROCK SHOOTER] will be available in the [Collab Member Target] 
Research Pool, in which you will be able to pick a rate-up character. 
Once picked, you have a 100% chance to receive this character 
when you get an A-Rank character.
2. Weapon Research:
※[★Rock Cannon] will be available in the [Collab Weapon Target] 
Research Pool, in which you will be able to pick a 6★ weapon. 
You have an 80% chance to get the picked weapon when 
you get a 6★ weapon from this pool.

Name: New Coating - Nightbreaker
ActivityDes:
New Coating:
Omniframe [Lucia: Crimson Weave] Coating: [Nightbreaker]

Info:
[Nightbreaker] will be on sale at "30% off" in "Top-up - Coating Supply"
during the event.

Name: Tactical Assessment Manual
ActivityDes:
Requirements: Commandant Lv.40

Event Info:
1. Accumulate Intel Value by completing the Rate Missions of the Daily, the Weekly, and the current Intel Manual.
2. Raise the Rating Level by reaching the required Intel Value.
3. You will obtain the corresponding reward upon reaching the required Rating Level.
4. You can also purchase additional Intel to get better rewards.

Name: Character Leap - Veritas
ActivityDes: Instructions: Experience the new powers brought about by Leap in the tutorial stage.

Name: Lost in Whitebloom
ActivityDes: Info: During the event, [Solitary Dream] can be obtained through "main interface - Solitary Dream" Research for limited time.\nYou can spend [Snowy Blossoms] to perform Coating Research.

Name: Guild Expedition IV
ActivityDes:
Requirements: Join a Command Bureau.
Event Info:

1. Join a Command Bureau and clear the stages with other Commandants.
2. Enemies found in the Cliff Fortress of the expedition area! Concentrate your firepower to destroy them!
3. The final boss Moon Eater will revive after being defeated. Can defeat it repeatedly!
4. Beat the final stage and clear Guild Expedition to claim stamps and a lot of loot.
5. Exchange loot for various rare materials in Guild Expedition Shop.
